Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


: : Darkangel : : 
He recieved the comm message from Tyrael, and opened a return channel. 
Darkangel: Understood. I'll begin work on this right away. 
Darkangel got the pod he had returned with ans set it up in a lab, connected to the computer system. First he got the black canister and unloaded it's contents into the pod, so it would be part of the protoform. That was easy. Now Darkangel was at the keyboards running through millions of files looking for the correct one. 
Finally after about ten minutes he found Burrock.dna on the system. He selected the file and began to upload it into the pod. The computer said it would take twenty minutes to complete the upload. 
Darkangel: Ok, I guess I'll be here for a while... 
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Tyrael opened a frequency with Darkangel.

Tyrael: Darkangel, this is Tyrael. I want you to create this new bot I
was talking about, since I can't be there right now. Go into the lab
with a blank stasis pod and download the Burrock.DNA file in it. Then,
include the black canister to its composition. Contact me when our new
soldier is born.
